config.starter_gifts.description: Choose what starter gift you'll receive as a new arrival!
config.starter_gifts.name: Starting Gift
config.daily_blessings.description: If turned on, this option will allow the seasonal deity altar to give you a blessing each day when interacted with.
config.daily_blessings.name: Daily Blessings
config.gift_level.description: Affects starting gifts. If you choose Overpowered, you will receive a slightly better starter gift to help you skip early game. Choose Regular for a normal run, or Challenge for a harder run.
config.gift_level.name: Starter Gift Level
config.misc_deco.name: Decoration Toggle
config.misc_deco.description: Enables or disables decorative elements such as the doghouse, fountain, etc.
config.duck_pond.name: Duck Pond Toggle
config.duck_pond.description: Enables or disables the duck pond in the center of the map.
config.gazebo.name: Gazebo Toggle
config.gazebo.description: Enables or disables the large gazebo in the south center area.
config.extra_foliage.name: Extra Foliage Toggle
config.extra_foliage.description: Enables or disables small decorative foliage in accessible areas of the farm.
config.big_foliage.name: Big Foliage Toggle
config.big_foliage.description: Enables or disables large foliage deco like fallen logs and decorative trees.
ui.farm.name: Honey Creek Farm
ui.farm.desc: A cute, well-rounded map suitable for most purposes.
